name: Enelia: Dawn of Madness
storyline:
In the world of Nauris, with its enchanting forest landscapes and hidden monstrous labyrinths, you will witness strange behavior of elders, dark rituals of priests, and disappearances of residents. Whether you master madness or become its victim, you will uncover various secrets of the world.

**"Enelia: Dawn of Madness"** is more than just a visual novel; it's a captivating adventure where your choices determine fate. Encounters with mythical creatures and mysterious characters leading to new revelations create a unique and unforgettable experience.

Forge a strong bond with a beloved character or become their sworn enemy, do good and maintain harmony or walk the path of darkness and plunge the world into chaos.

The choice is yours - follow the call of the Voice or dive into the very heart of Madness?
summary:
Immerse yourself in the enigmatic world of Nauris, where enchanting landscapes hide terrifying secrets: the strange behavior of elders, sinister rituals of priests, and the disappearance of citizens.

Madness lurks everywhere – will you master it or become its victim?

The choice is yours.
